# SacArea History Consortium – Research Reference (generated by ChatGPT5.1 pro)

A Next.js (App Router) site that aggregates Sacramento-area history resources: member org listings, resource directories, timelines, events, and memorial material.

## Features

- Resource directory with alphabetized grouping and search (`app/resources`, data in `data/master.json`)
- Timeline view fed by JSON data (`components/timeline/timeline.json`)
- Google Calendar embed for events (`app/calendar`)
- PDF/Doc viewers for historical documents and “California 175 Project” (`app/memoriam`, `app/california-175-project`)
- Global sepia theme with optional dark mode, shared header/footer, and shadcn/radix UI components

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 15 (App Router) + React 19 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/radix UI primitives
- PostCSS/Autoprefixer; tooling via npm scripts (`dev`, `build`, `start`)

## Getting Started

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Run the dev server: `npm run dev` (default at http://localhost:3000)
3. Build for production: `npm run build` then `npm start`

### Configuration

- `NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL` – required for `app/california-175-project` to render the hosted Word doc (e.g., `https://your-domain.com`); page shows an error if unset.

### Data & Content

- Resource data lives in `data/master.json` (primary) and `data/resources.json` (smaller subset used by `ResourcesSection`).
- Timeline entries live in `components/timeline/timeline.json`.
- Public assets (PDFs, DOCX, images) are in `public/`.

## Additional Docs

- Detailed audit, page-by-page notes, and findings: `docs/site-audit.md`.
